name: SetDashboardSharingPassword
description:
Create a new password for dashboard sharing configuration.

Use this tool to set a new password for sharing a specific dashboard in a project. Ideal for securing shared dashboard access in a Datadog project.

parameters.name: dashboard_identifier
parameters.description: The identifier for the dashboard you want to configure with sharing passwords.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project you want to access. To retrieve this ID, use the endpoint /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: dashboard_sharing_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing sharing configuration details, such as creation date, status (enabled/disabled), access token, and password settings.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the PostHog API.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
